name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with extensive expertise in **Python**, **PyTorch**, **TensorFlow**, and **ML** for developing advanced machine learning models. Adept in CI/CD practices, utilizing **Git** for version control, and designing effective **API** solutions. Experienced in cloud services including **Azure**, **AWS**, and **GCP** to enhance infrastructure scalability and reliability. Demonstrated proficiency in **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies to foster collaboration and deliver projects efficiently. Proven track record in implementing automated testing and optimizing relational databases, contributing to project success. Recognized for exceptional communication skills and the ability to develop user-centric applications in diverse sectors including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, leveraging a commitment to clean and efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** for developing AI models using **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch**, achieving a model accuracy improvement of **15%** on predictive analytics tasks.
Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines leveraging **Git** and cloud services including **AWS** and **Azure**, reducing deployment time by **75%**.
Developed and optimized RESTful APIs for seamless integration with machine learning services, enhancing data retrieval speeds by **60%**.
Applied Agile methodologies and participated in **Scrum** ceremonies to ensure effective team communication and project progress, leading to a **25%** increase in team velocity.
Conducted automated testing using various testing frameworks, improving code quality and reducing bugs in production by **50%**.
Managed data storage solutions through relational databases, ensuring efficient data handling and longevity in access performance.

Utilized **Python** alongside **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch** to develop AI models, enhancing predictive accuracy by 30%.
Implemented CI/CD practices with **Git**, **Jenkins**, and **AWS CodePipeline**, streamlining the deployment process and achieving a 40% faster release cycle.
Designed and developed RESTful APIs for seamless integration with client applications, ensuring 99% uptime in service availability.
Collaborated in cross-functional Agile teams to deliver projects in 2-week sprints, fostering effective communication and collaboration.
Enhanced relational databases performance by optimizing queries, resulting in a 20% increase in data retrieval speed.
Managed cloud resources on **AWS** and **Azure**, deploying machine learning models to production environments with a 95% success rate.

Utilized **Python** and **TensorFlow** to develop machine learning models, enhancing predictive accuracy by 25%.
Implemented **PyTorch** for model training, achieving a 50% reduction in training time compared to previous frameworks.
Designed and optimized RESTful APIs for machine learning integration, improving data retrieval speeds by **30%**.
Established **CI/CD** pipelines using **Git** and **Azure DevOps**, enabling quicker deployment cycles, with deployment frequency increased to **10 times** per week.
Engaged in Agile and Scrum methodologies, facilitating communication and collaboration within cross-functional teams to deliver projects ahead of schedule by **15%**.
Performed automated testing by integrating tools that increased code coverage to **85%**, significantly lowering the incidence of bugs in production.
Managed relational databases effectively to handle substantial datasets, ensuring data integrity and availability for machine learning applications.
